commitResults.messageTitle: Level_0 Rename, Greet, Exit
Add echo capability to chatbot
commitResults.messageBody:
Chatbot cannot answer or interact with user.

Let's import scanner class from java.util and use it to read in a line
from user and print it back out in terminal.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add ability to store user input into task list and display it
commitResults.messageBody:
There is no way for the chatbot to allow the user to input and create
any lists for functionality.

Let's add a String array of size 100 to store any tasks for the user,
and make use of "list" command to display these itemized tasks back to
user.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add ability to mark tasks as done or not
commitResults.messageBody:
There is no way to keep the list updated with the current status of a
task. Task as a list of strings is too limited as a data type.

Let's keep tasks as a class on it's own and add isDone boolean value
to it, and add new commands to mark and unmark tasks. Add in a method
to handle out of bound demands to chatbot.

commitResults.messageTitle: Create javadocs comment for added method and clean up code to match coding standard
Add 3 new inherited classes for task and implement toString() for Task
commitResults.messageBody:
Important to create inherited classes for different types of task class.
The print statements for tasks too long, and toString can be overridden
to optimize code.

The inherited classes are not implemented in main code logic yet.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add functional logic in Ultron.java for different task types
commitResults.messageBody:
Create if-else extension to account for new task types to allow user
more flexibility

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix bug for user input for mark/unmark command and display for events
commitResults.messageBody:
When user inputs mark -1, or index less than zero the program crashes
instead of displaying an out of bounds message. Creating an event task
had semantic [D] instead of [E].

Implement a check for taskNumber<0, and change toString of Event class

commitResults.messageTitle: Add task count when new task is added
commitResults.messageBody:
User cannot see how many tasks have been added when creating a new task.

Add one line of code to print this after "added <task>:" string

commitResults.messageTitle: Use I/O technique to automate testing of Ultron
commitResults.messageBody:
Testing involves retyping commands several times and manually observing
difference. This is tedious and error-prone.

Fix runtest.bat to automate testing, and update input and EXPECTED
files accordingly.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor code to improve code quality
commitResults.messageBody:
Many lines of code and logic blocks are repetitive and hard to read.

Let's extract magic literals and repeated code as methods and variables
to try and achieve SLAP.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor code to switch-case and extract out common methods
commitResults.messageBody:
Code is too lengthy in main() function and SLAP is not ideal for
readability.

Let's use tutorial PR exercise to help refactor and change the code
to improve readability for others. Includes a bug fix for lengthy
event and deadline descriptions.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add minimal error handling for empty todo and invalid command
commitResults.messageBody:
Let's add minimal error checking for when todo description is empty,
and when invalid command is added. Additional check added for when
mark and unmark do not come with a valid task number.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add error handling for event and deadline commands
commitResults.messageBody:
Invalid or empty strings can be entered by the user for deadline and
event command, which causes the code to crash. The main() function
has too many try-catch blocks, impairs readability of code.

Let's add in error-handling for empty or invalid command syntax for
user, and let's abstract out error-handling to the handle functions.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'branch-Level-5'
Add package structure to code base
commitResults.messageBody:
All class files fall under ./java directory. This could get very
crowded.

Let's create package ultron, and subpackages ultron.tasks and
ultron.exceptions and move requisite files into each.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'branch-A-Packages'
Tweak runtest.bat to account for package structure
Add collection interface for task list
commitResults.messageBody:
Let's add a ArrayList<Task> for the tasklist to allow dynamic resizing
of the list and and change the subsequent references to it accordingly.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add in delete command functionality
commitResults.messageBody:
Not possible to remove a task from the list.

Let's add a new command and method to handle deletion by user.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add save and read from file functionality
Refactor out lengthy code to read in stored data
Add update stored data method at end of main() method
commitResults.messageBody: This allows cleaner code and fewer preexisting methods to be altered.

commitResults.messageTitle: Cosmetic changes to task-added message and handleUnmark params
Merge branch 'branch-Level-6'
Merge branch 'branch-Level-7'

# Conflicts:
#	src/main/java/ultron/Ultron.java

commitResults.messageTitle: Create an A-Jar file for first release
Add in Ui class and refactor code to shift into new class
commitResults.messageBody:
Let's extract all interaction methods to Ui class and refactor all the
code likewise by instantiating new Ui() class.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add storage and parser class and refactor code to match
Add in Tasklist class and refactor to match, add in packages for all refactored classes
Add a filter by date and date formatting in Deadline tasks
Add find command to allow user to search for keywords
commitResults.messageBody:
No way to search for a certain task in a long list.

Let's add in a new method to Tasklist class to handle a find command by
creating a filtered list.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add error exception handling for the datefind method
Add JavaDoc comments for non-trivial methods for documentation
Merge pull request #3 from nmarwah7/branch-Level-9
commitResults.messageBody: Add find command to allow user to search for keywords

commitResults.messageBody:
The command summary table is improperly formatted.

Let's fix it according to HTML convention.

commitResults.messageBody: Add in a bug fix for deadline /by incorrect date parameters

commitResults.messageBody: Let's fix a few bugs regarding how packages are structured.
